word: My brother, in regard to this last point, you have tried to hurt the influence of those who did not come into line in harmony with your ideas, who would not submit to your judgement. But in some respects, the judgement of those you so harshly condemned, was superior to your own. Your harshness has separated from the work men who would have been an honor to the truth, men who were fitted to do excellent service in the medical missionary work. But they refused to be bound to your terms.
